__e: Yo, what this little worm-faced fuck say to you?
This thing's no more worm than you or I.
How do I know Oscar didn't give my name to that slime bag Victor.
I don't know what you have convinced yourself that you are, but you will never be anything more than a sad little... freak.
Who do you think was the dirty, stinking rat that killed our pa?
He's just a creep who knows exactly what he's doing.
That fucking creep you let in the house, he did this!
You're telling me that I have a worm living in my brain?
And now she's got a new slimeball, and if that doesn't work out, I'm sure another Mr. Wrong will come along, 'cause that seems to be her thing.
Even if I had, I don't have any fucking maggots and fucking eggs all over me.
Anyway, I heard about what happened. I really felt terrible and thought I should--
Don't you ever give that tapeworm of yours a rest?
Well, what I actually said was you can take your tapeworm and your tiny arsonist and get your limey ass out of here!
If you need help, if you need something happy, you don't have to say it.
Not such a stupid worm now, are you?
You see, no one's ever stood up for Worm. The guy's been kicked around his whole life, from his father on down.
